prompt:
Given a free-form description of a 3D object related to cultural heritage, classify it into one of the two available categories: [0, 1]. If the description does not clearly match a category, make an educated guess. If multiple valid indices exist, randomly select one and justify your choice. If no valid index is inferable, return 'Cannot infer'.

Respond in the format: index#class#short reason (max 10 words).
